attributes.action: make an urgent public statement to explain to the voters of this country why he should not resign following the activities of Damian McBride who was appointed by him and was a senior adviser in his political office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: McBride's activities were on behalf of McBroon therefore McBroon is responsible and should demonstrate that he has at least one iota of honour and probity and immediately resign.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
